channel.title: Events on Ziggurat
channel.description: Recent content in Events on Ziggurat

item.title: Revision 2018
item.description: The main demoscene event of the year, Revision, took place last weekend in Saarbrücken, Germany. Once again I failed to actually make it over there, but I did manage to catch a fair amount of the live streams. The full compo results can be found here. Here are a few of my faves:

item.title: California Extreme added to Calendar
item.description: I’m rather ashamed to admit that while I lived in the Bay Area for 6 years, I never made it to California Extreme. Looks brilliant, for the pinball alone.

item.title: The Retro Show Event Added to Calendar
item.description: I’ve added The Retro Show to the calendar. The show’s theme is the age old Speccy vs C64 battle, and promises four floors of retro computers, arcade machines, traders and more.
